## Introduction

This analysis explores the Laconia Burial data from Gallou.

## Load Libraries

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Load Data

```{r load-data}
# Load the data from the Data folder
data_path <- here::here("Data", "laconiaburialstatsgallou.xlsx")
burial_data <- read_excel(data_path)

# Display first few rows
head(burial_data)
```

## Data Overview

```{r data-summary}
# Get basic information about the dataset
dim(burial_data)
str(burial_data)
summary(burial_data)
```

## Column Names

```{r column-names}
# See all column names
colnames(burial_data)
```
